description:
Are you a new or aspiring author who does not know where to start with marketing your book? Then this course is for you.

When you wrote your book, little did you realize that you would need to market it in order for it to reach your audience. You might have published on Amazon and left it there, thinking it would market itself. But, hey, what a rude awakening when you realized that your book would not simply sell itself. To add to your frustrations, you have discovered that there is such a maze of information out there, that you do not even know where to start.

If the above is true then this Course if for you. Learn how to promote your book online and get your book noticed fast.
title: Book Marketing in Five - How to get your book noticed fast
